Improvements.Improvement: Extract creation of annotations into separate methods
Improvements.Change_Diff: Extract the creation of each annotation into separate methods, like `buildColumnMetaAnnotation`, `buildDimensionFormulaAnnotation`, `buildReadPermissionAnnotation`, `buildEnumeratedAnnotation`, and `buildTemporalAnnotation`.
Improvements.Description: The `buildAnnotations` method is quite lengthy and complex. The creation of each annotation could be extracted into a separate private method. This would make the code more readable and maintainable. Each method should be responsible for creating a single type of annotation.
